column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Today I am taking an airplane to go visit my grandmother .
#id=2
#text=I bought the ticket a few weeks ago and last night I packed my suitcases with clothes and the other items I would need for my trip .
#id=3
#text=I woke up early today and got my ID and my suitcase and headed for the airport .
#id=4
#text=After I parked my car , I went to the check in counter and showed the worker my ID .
#id=5
#text=She printed out a ticket for me , checked in my suitcase and told me what gate to head to in order to catch my flight .
#id=6
#text=As I got close to the gate I went through security where they scanned my purse and carry-on bag then had me remove my shoes and walk through the metal detectors .
#id=7
#text=I put my shoes back on and got my bags and then sat down and waited for my flight to start boarding .
#id=8
#text=When they made an announcement that my plane was boarding , I got in line and waited my turn .
#id=9
#text=Once I got on the plane I looked at my ticket to find my seat number , found my seat and sat down and buckled my seat belt .
#text=After everyone was done boarding , the pilot announced we were clear for take off and the plane began to move .
